description: The OpenID Connect vocabulary used by the Solid-OIDC authentication specification.
label: Solid OIDC

client_name.description: A name for this client that can be presented to an End-User
client_name.label: client name

client_uri.description: A URI for this client's home page
client_uri.label: client URI

contacts.description: A collection of URIs where individuals or entities responsible for this client can be contacted.
contacts.label: contacts

grant_types.description: A collection of OAuth 2.0 Grant Types that the client will restrict itself to using.
grant_types.label: grant types

logo_uri.description: A URI for this client's logo
logo_uri.label: logo URI

policy_uri.description: A URI for this client's policy document
policy_uri.label: policy URI

redirect_uris.description: A collection of registered URIs used by the client for redirection
redirect_uris.label: redirect URIs

response_types.description: A collection of OAuth 2.0 Response Types that the client will restrict itself to using.
response_types.label: response types

scope.description: An OAuth2 scope for the requested access token.
scope.label: scope

token_endpoint_auth_method.description: The requested client authentication method for the Token Endpoint
token_endpoint_auth_method.label: token endpoint auth method

tos_uri.description: A URI for this client's terms of service document
tos_uri.label: ToS URI
